message.raw:
Added the following remote methods:
* get/set_labscript_file
* get_set_shot_output_folder
* error_in_globals (only considers open tabs of atcive groups)
* is_output_folder_default
* reset_shot_output_folder

This required the following new attributes:
* GroupTab().tab_contains_errors
* RunManager().non_default_folder
